Class: RFDriver

RFDriver()

new RFDriver()

Properties:
Name Type Description
manifest Object

The manifest for this driver
options Object

The options for this device as configured in the 'rf' property of the driver
logger Logger

The logger instance for this device instance

Methods

getDevice(data) → {RFDevice|null}

Gets a device which matches given payload data object

Parameters:
Name Type Description
data Object

the data object to match with
Returns:

The first Device that matches the given data.

Type
RFDevice | null

onInit()

The onInit method is called when a driver is initialized. Note. when overriding this method make sure you call super.onInit() or use onRFInit() which is called after onInit()

onPair(socket) → {RFDevice}

The pair method that is called when the user opens the pair view of this driver. Note. When overriding this method make sure you call super.onPair(socket)!

Parameters:
Name Type Description
socket Object

The socket connection object to the pair view
Returns:

The instance of the pairDevice

Type
RFDevice
